dmca.title: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. - http://www.helbreathx
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: TBryan, HBUSA [mailto:tbryan@ient.com] 
Posted At: Saturday, October 07, 2006 2:36 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your
servers. - http://www.helbreathx.net/
Subject: Illegal and pirated information being hosted on your servers. -
http://www.helbreathx.net/
Importance: High


Hello,

 

I am Tamara Bryan, Gamemaster of HelbreathUSA
http://www.helbreathusa.com .  I am contacting you in regards to the web
site Helbreath Xtreme http://www.helbreathx.net/

 

The official game site of the developer is located at 
http://www.helbreath.com <http://www.helbreath.com/>  and legally
licensed by http://www.helbreathusa.com <http://www.helbreathusa.com> .
This web site is hosting information and files advertising and how to
connect to their illegal server.  We, iENT, are authorized by the
copyright owner, Siementech, to seek out and close illegal servers.

 

Their actions include copyright infringement and software piracy related
material.  The source code for this game was illegally leaked to the
public, and altered by those not authorized by the copyright holder.

 

The participants are violating the copyright agreement as your servers
are being used in an illegal fashion. Please take care of this abuse of
our copyright and your Terms of Service by removing this website.

 

Please advise me of exactly what action has been taken so that I can
advise the copyright owner and get that information back to you.  

 

Thank you for your prompt action in this matter.

 

Sincerely, 

 

Tamara Bryan

Game Master Helbreath USA
